front.title: XMPP Pubsub Extenstion for Long-lived TCP Services

abstract.t: This memo defines extensions to pubsub features of the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) that will address issues encountered by a long-lived TCP connection in mobile environments. Network resources consumption issues are happenned when there are frequent notification messages have been transmitted periodically. Depending on raised issues, the extension for XMPP pubsub protocol could be considered to optimize network quality.
